alert.note: Alert for George; Greene (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 09 at 12:47AM CST until February 09 at 1:15AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... George County in southeastern Mississippi... Southern Greene County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 115 AM CST. * At 1246 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles south of McLain to 13 miles west of Lucedale to 16 miles east of Perkinston, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lucedale. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
